english.segment1: We sing to you oh God for you are good. Your love for us will always carry on. Your faithfulness is brighter than the dawn. The whole universe is echoing your song. Hear it rise
english.segment2: Your anthem we sing out. You are holy you are holy. Before you we bow down. You are worthy you are worthy. Oh God
english.segment3: Every drop into youÂ’re fall down on their knees. To you oh God the one and only king. All creation cries that your glory be may known. And every heart will know you are God alone
english.segment4: Your anthem we sing out. You are holy you are holy. Before you we bow down. You are worthy you are worthy. Your anthem we sing out. You are holy you are holy. Before you we bow down. You are worthy you are worthy.
